text: Skip to Main Content Membership Events Donate Kiddush Center City Beit Midrash Join Us Davening Who We Are Kosher Restaurants More Support Mekor Kosher Restaurants Philadelphia is blessed to have a growing number of Kosher establishments. Our listings are provided for information purposes only: check the current certifying agency before visiting. If you find the information in this page to be inaccurate, please contact us. Click Here Center City Restaurants 20th Street Pizza Vegan Pizzeria (IKC Supervision) 108 S 20th St (215) 398-5748 Bar Bombon Vegan Food with Latin Flavors (IKC Supervision) 133 S. 18th Street (267) 606-6612 Note: Alcoholic beverages are NOT under supervision; list of approved alcoholic beverages available at restaurant upon request.     Support Mekor

    Kosher Restaurants

    Philadelphia is blessed to have a growing number of Kosher establishments. Our listings are provided for information purposes only: check the current certifying agency before visiting.  If you find the information in this page to be inaccurate, please contact us. 

    Center City Restaurants

    20th Street Pizza

    Vegan Pizzeria (IKC Supervision)

    108 S 20th St
    (215) 398-5748

    133 S. 18th Street
    (267) 606-6612

    Note: Alcoholic beverages are NOT under supervision; list of approved alcoholic beverages available at restaurant upon request.

    (215) 573-7596
